---
title: "NYC_squirrels"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r libraries}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(tidyverse))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(lubridate))
```

Get data and format
```{r}
nyc_squirrels <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-10-29/nyc_squirrels.csv") %>% 
  mutate_at(vars(date), mdy) #date conversion

 
```


```{r}
ggplot(nyc_squirrels, aes(date)) + geom_bar()
```

Does squirrel activity vary by squirrel color? 
```{r}
data <- nyc_squirrels %>% 
  select(primary_fur_color, highlight_fur_color, combination_of_primary_and_highlight_color,
         kuks, quaas, moans,
         tail_flags, tail_twitches, approaches, indifferent, runs_from, other_interactions)
```
